column4: does anyone have the link of .debs for the different wine packages? I can't find it
add the wine ppa
I did that as well
then if you run: sudo apt-get update; apt-cache search wine   you should see it
yep you need to tell the package system to refresh the lists ;)
learn something new everyday ;)

yup
add this to /etc/hosts       88.191.101.8 packages.medibuntu.org
then try again
still getting the same problem after adding that
so if you run: dig packages.medibuntu.org    does it resolve to 88.191.101.8 ?
thats why, its the wrong IP. are you sure you added the line in /etc/hosts   and did you save the file ok?
